quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The present moment is all you ever have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The obstacle is the way.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
author: Plato

quote: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
author: Caroline Myss

quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Suffering is not holding you. You are holding suffering.
author: Buddha

quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: The only thing that is ultimately real about your journey is the step that you are taking at this moment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
author: Rumi

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The most beautiful people are those who have known defeat, suffering, struggle, loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.
author: Amit Ray

quote: The deeper that sorrow carves into your being, the more joy you can contain.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Let go of what has passed. Let go of what may come. Let go of what is happening now. Don't try to figure anything out.
author: Tilopa

quote: The truth is that our finest moments are most likely to occur when we are feeling deeply uncomfortable, unhappy, or unfulfilled.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: You are the universe experiencing itself.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart.
author: Rumi

quote: Everything is energy and that's all there is to it. Match the frequency of the reality you want.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation.
author: Rumi

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: Your heart knows the way. Run in that direction.
author: Rumi

quote: The moment you accept what troubles you've been given, the door will open.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote: The soul has been given its own ears to hear things the mind does not understand.
author: Rumi

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: The garden of the world has no limits, except in your mind.
author: Rumi

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
author: Rumi

quote: The cure for pain is in the pain.
author: Rumi

quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
author: Rumi

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: The very center of your heart is where life begins - the most beautiful place on earth.
author: Rumi

quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
author: Rumi

quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
author: Rumi

quote: The wound is where the light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
author: Rumi

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do.
author: Rumi

quote: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
author: Rumi

quote: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

quote: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious.
author: Rumi

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi

quote: The lion is most handsome when looking for food.
author: Rumi

quote: Be grateful for whoever comes, because each has been sent as a guide from beyond.
author: Rumi

quote: Knock, and He'll open the door. Vanish, and He'll make you shine like the sun. Fall, and He'll raise you to the heavens.
author: Rumi

quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.
author: Rumi

quote: The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don't go back to sleep.
author: Rumi

quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
author: Rumi

quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
author: Rumi

quote: The art of knowing is knowing what to ignore.
author: Rumi

quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
author: Rumi

quote: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
author: Rumi

quote: Be empty of worrying. Think of who created thought.
author: Rumi

quote: Why should I be unhappy? Every parcel of my being is in full bloom.
author: Rumi

quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
author: Rumi

quote: Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love.
author: Rumi

quote: When I run after what I think I want, my days are a furnace of stress and anxiety.
author: Rumi

quote: Ignore those that make you fearful and sad, that degrade you back towards disease and death.
author: Rumi

quote: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
author: Rumi

quote: The inspiration you seek is already within you. Be silent and listen.
author: Rumi

quote: What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle.
author: Rumi

quote: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart.
author: Rumi

quote: Start a huge, foolish project, like Noah. It makes absolutely no difference what people think of you.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't turn away. Keep your gaze on the bandaged place. That's where the light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: The moon stays bright when it doesn't avoid the night.
author: Rumi

quote: These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.
author: Rumi

quote: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.
author: Rumi

quote: You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly.
author: Rumi

quote: Close your eyes. Fall in love. Stay there.
author: Rumi

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi
